doc.title: Secrets of the Cryptkeeper's Haunted House
doc.plot: Emmy winning reality game show hosted by Steve Saunders and the Cryptkeeper himself. Kids go on an incredible adventure as they race to find the treasure buried in the Cryptkeeper's Graveyard. The challenges are both real and virtual including a Shrinking Room, a Giant Abyss, and a practical three story Haunted House with dozens of secret passages. Along the way the adventurers face bubbling lava fields, flaming fireballs,and their own worst fears.
